message: Fix race condition on Amqps Open

added: private static final int MAX_WAIT_TO_OPEN_CLOSE_CONNECTION = 1*60*1000; // 1 minute timeout
// Codes_SRS_AMQPSIOTHUBCONNECTION_21_051 [The open lock shall be notified when that the connection has been established.]
deleted: private static final int MAX_WAIT_TO_OPEN_CLOSE_CONNECTION = 1*60*1000; // 1 second timeout
